column5: Killing vampires? Where do I sign up?

column4: [INFO:020126C0] ('That's what everybody says, right up until they find their throat being ripped out by a pack of hungry vampires.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ00IntroD "Sorry, I'm not interested." [DIAL:0200D8CF])

column5: Sorry, I'm not interested.

column4: [INFO:0200D8D8] ('Oh, hey there! You here to join the Dawnguard, too?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8CE])
[INFO:0200D907] ('Truth is, I'm a little nervous. I've never done anything like this before. I hope you don't mind if I walk up with you.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8CD])
[INFO:0200D903] ('Hey, uh, don't tell Isran I was afraid to meet him by myself. Not the best first impression for a new vampire hunter, I guess.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8CC])
[INFO:0200D8FB] ('That must be it. Fort Dawnguard... Wow. Bigger than I expected.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8CB])
[INFO:0200D8F6] ('You've probably killed lots of vampires, huh? I'm sure Isran will sign you right up. Not sure he'll take me. I hope so.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8CA])
[INFO:0200D8EF] ('Where is everybody? This place looks almost deserted.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8C9])
[INFO:0200D8E9] ('Here to join the Dawnguard? Good.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8C8])
[INFO:0200D8E8] ('New recruits? Hmm.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8C8])
[INFO:0200D8DD] ('Well? Ready to join the fight against the damn vampires?' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ01IntroTopic [DIAL:0200D8C7])
[INFO:0200D8DC] ('So who are you? What do you want?' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ01IntroTopic [DIAL:0200D8C7])
[INFO:0200D906] ('Isran will decide if you've got what it takes. Go on, he's right inside.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8C6])
[INFO:0200D902] ('Why are you here, Tolan? The Vigilants and I were finished with each other a long time ago.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8C5])
[INFO:0200D8F5] ('You know why I'm here. The Vigilants are under attack everywhere. The vampires are much more dangerous than we believed.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8C4])
[INFO:0200D8EE] ('And now you want to come running to safety with the Dawnguard, is that it?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8C3])
[INFO:0200D8E7] ('I remember Keeper Carcette telling me repeatedly that Fort Dawnguard is a crumbling ruin, not worth the expense and manpower to repair.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8C2])
[INFO:0200D8E1] ('And now that you've stirred up the vampires against you, you come begging for my protection?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8C1])

[INFO:0200D8DB] ('Isran, Carcette is dead. The Hall of the Vigilants... everyone... they're all dead. You were right, we were wrong. Isn't that enough for you?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8C0])
[INFO:0200D8D7] ('Yes, well... I never wanted any of this to happen. I tried to warn all of you... I am sorry, you know.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8BF])

column2: DLC1VQ01IntroA1 "I'm here to join the Dawnguard." [DIAL:0200D8BE]
column4: [INFO:0200D901] ('Got a fire in your belly to kill vampires, eh? Good for you.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ01IntroA1 "I'm here to join the Dawnguard." [DIAL:0200D8BE])

column3: DLC1VQ01IntroA1 "I'm here to join the Dawnguard." [DIAL:0200D8BE]
column5: I'm here to join the Dawnguard.

column2: DLC1VQ01IntroA2 "I heard you were looking for vampire hunters." [DIAL:0200D8BD]
column4: [INFO:0200D8FA] ('You heard right. I'm glad word's finally starting to get around. But that means it won't be long before the vampires start to take notice as well.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ01IntroA2 "I heard you were looking for vampire hunters." [DIAL:0200D8BD])

column3: DLC1VQ01IntroA2 "I heard you were looking for vampire hunters." [DIAL:0200D8BD]
column5: I heard you were looking for vampire hunters.

column2: DLC1VQ01IntroA3 "I was just looking around. What is this place?" [DIAL:0200D8BC]
column4: [INFO:0200D8F4] ('Why do I even post guards? This is the headquarters of the Dawnguard. Well, it used to be, a long time ago.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ01IntroA3 "I was just looking around. What is this place?" [DIAL:0200D8BC])

column3: DLC1VQ01IntroA3 "I was just looking around. What is this place?" [DIAL:0200D8BC]
column5: I was just looking around. What is this place?

column2: DLC1VQ01IntroB1 "What can I do to help?" [DIAL:0200D8BB]
column4: [INFO:02010EB9] ('I need someone out in the field, taking the fight to the damn vampires, while we're getting the fort back into shape...' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ01IntroB1 "What can I do to help?" [DIAL:0200D8BB])

column3: DLC1VQ01IntroB1 "What can I do to help?" [DIAL:0200D8BB]
column5: What can I do to help?

column4: [INFO:0200D8E6] ('Tolan, tell her about, what was it, Dimhollow?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8BA])
[INFO:0200D8E5] ('Tolan, tell him about, what was it, Dimhollow?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8BA])
[INFO:0200D8DA] ('Yes, that's it. Dimhollow Crypt. Brother Adalvald was sure it held some long-lost vampire artifact of some kind.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8B9])
[INFO:0200D8D6] ('That's good enough for me. Go see what the vampires were looking for in this Dimhollow Crypt. With any luck, they'll still be there.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8B8])
[INFO:0200D905] ('I'll meet you at Dimhollow. It's the least I can do to avenge my fallen comrades.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8B7])
[INFO:0200D900] ('Tolan, I don't think that's a good idea.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8B6])
[INFO:0200D8F9] ('You Vigilants were never trained for...' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8B5])
[INFO:0200D8F3] ('I know what you think of us. You think we're soft, that we're cowards. You think our deaths proved our weakness.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8B4])
[INFO:0200D8EC] ('I'm going to Dimhollow Crypt. Perhaps I can be of some small assistance to you.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8B3])

column2: DLC1VQ01IntroB2 "I'll have to think about it." [DIAL:0200D8B2]
column4: [INFO:0200D8E4] ([G]'While you're thinking about it, the vampires will be gathering strength in the shadows, waiting to strike.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ01IntroB2 "I'll have to think about it." [DIAL:0200D8B2])

column3: DLC1VQ01IntroB2 "I'll have to think about it." [DIAL:0200D8B2]
column5: I'll have to think about it.

column4: [INFO:0200D8F1] ('You there, boy. Stop skulking in the shadows and step up here. What's your name?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8B1])
[INFO:0200D8D9] ('I'm, uh... my name is Agmaer, sir.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8B0])
[INFO:0200D8E0] ('Do I look like a "sir" to you, boy? I'm not a soldier, and you're not joining the army.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8AF])
[INFO:0200D8D5] ('Yes, si... Isran.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8AE])
[INFO:0200D904] ('Didn't I tell you to step forward? Hmm... Farm boy, eh? What's your weapon?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8AD])
[INFO:0200D8FF] ('Uh, my weapon? I mostly just use my pa's axe, when wolves are attacking the goats or something.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8AC])
[INFO:0200D8F8] ('"My pa's axe", Stendarr preserve us.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8AB])
[INFO:0200D8F2] ('Don't worry, I think we can make a Dawnguard out of you. Here, take this crossbow and let's see how you shoot.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8AA])
[INFO:0200D8EB] ('Uh, crossbow? I've never...' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8A9])
[INFO:0200D8E3] ('Yes, a crossbow. Best thing for killing vampires. Just take a few shots at those crates over there.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8A8])
[INFO:0200D8DF] ('Feel free to poke around the fort and take what you need. There isn't much yet, but you're welcome to anything you can use.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D8A7])

column2: DLC1VQ04RNPCSoulCairnBranchTopic "Anything you can tell me about the Soul Cairn?" [DIAL:0200D885]
column4: [INFO:0200D88A] ('The Soul Cairn is a tiny sliver of Oblivion, the realm of the daedra.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ04RNPCSoulCairnBranchTopic "Anything you can tell me about the Soul Cairn?" [DIAL:0200D885])

column3: DLC1VQ04RNPCSoulCairnBranchTopic "Anything you can tell me about the Soul Cairn?" [DIAL:0200D885]
column5: Anything you can tell me about the Soul Cairn?

column2: DLC1VQ04RNPCSoulCairnBranchTopic01 "Why was your mother so fascinated by it?" [DIAL:0200D884]
column4: [INFO:0200D889] ('Honestly, I don't know. Necromancers are always interested in souls, though, so that probably has some kind of interest.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ04RNPCSoulCairnBranchTopic01 "Why was your mother so fascinated by it?" [DIAL:0200D884])

column3: DLC1VQ04RNPCSoulCairnBranchTopic01 "Why was your mother so fascinated by it?" [DIAL:0200D884]
column5: Why was your mother so fascinated by it?

column4: [INFO:0200D88B] ('Nobody really knows.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ04RNPCSoulCairnIdealMastersBranchTopic "What exactly are the Ideal Masters?" [DIAL:0200D883])

column5: What exactly are the Ideal Masters?

column2: DLC1VQ04RNPCSoulCairnIdealMastersBranchTopic01 "Then how are you sure they even exist?" [DIAL:0200D882]
column4: [INFO:0200D888] ('I've read stories. Stories about fools that managed to... communicate with them.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ04RNPCSoulCairnIdealMastersBranchTopic01 "Then how are you sure they even exist?" [DIAL:0200D882])

column3: DLC1VQ04RNPCSoulCairnIdealMastersBranchTopic01 "Then how are you sure they even exist?" [DIAL:0200D882]
column5: Then how are you sure they even exist?

column4: [INFO:0200D887] ('Because most of the stories end with the Ideal Masters duping the necromancers, who end up dead or wishing they were dead.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ04RNPCSoulCairnIdealMastersBranchTopic02 "Fools? Why do you say that?" [DIAL:0200D881])

column5: Fools? Why do you say that?

column2: DLC1VQ04RNPCLaboatoryBranchTopic "Your mother maintained quite a laboratory." [DIAL:0200D880]
column4: [INFO:0200D886] ('I had no idea that her laboratory even existed.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ04RNPCLaboatoryBranchTopic "Your mother maintained quite a laboratory." [DIAL:0200D880])

column3: DLC1VQ04RNPCLaboatoryBranchTopic "Your mother maintained quite a laboratory." [DIAL:0200D880]
column5: Your mother maintained quite a laboratory.

column4: [INFO:0200D88D] ('Looking at the equipment and materials, it looks like she was trying to advance her necromancy.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ04RNPCLaboatoryBranchTopic01 "What did she research?" [DIAL:0200D87F])

column5: What did she research?

column4: [INFO:0200D88C] ('I don't know. Certainly not longevity. Kind of a waste of time for a vampire.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ04RNPCLaboatoryBranchTopic02 "To what end?" [DIAL:0200D87E])

column5: To what end?

column4: [INFO:0200D87C] ('But now... we have a clue. Something made by the Forge. Something that can lead us to it.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1LD_KatriaAskForge3 [DIAL:0200D87A])

[INFO:0200D7E0] ('Before my father became obsessed with the prophecy, mother and I spent quite a bit of time together.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ04RNPCValericaViewTopic "Were you and Valerica close?" [DIAL:0200D7D7])

column5: Were you and Valerica close?

column4: [INFO:0200D7DD] ('Like the best of friends. I would never hesitate to share anything with her.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ04RNPCValericaViewTopic01 "So you always got along?" [DIAL:0200D7D6])

column5: So you always got along?

column4: [INFO:0200D7DB] ('It was very sudden. It was almost like one day we were a normal family, and then the next I didn't know who they were.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ04RNPCValericaViewTopic02 "But then it all changed." [DIAL:0200D7D5])

column5: But then it all changed.

column4: [INFO:0200D7D9] ('She had to be up to something in that garden. I'm hoping it's a clue that will tell us where she went.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ04RNPCValericaViewTopic03 "That's why we're headed there?" [DIAL:0200D7D4])

column5: That's why we're headed there?

column4: [INFO:0200D7E8] ('What happened to this place?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D7D3])
[INFO:0200D7E6] ('This used to lead into the castle's great hall. It looks like my father had it sealed up.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D7D2])
[INFO:0200D7E5] ('This was my mother's garden. It... do you know how beautiful something can be when it's tended by a master for hundreds of years?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D7D1])
[INFO:0200D7E3] ('Something's wrong with the moondial here. Some of the crests are missing and the dial is askew.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D7D0])
[INFO:0200D7E2] ('Wait...' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D7CF])
[INFO:0200D7DF] ('I used to walk through here after evening meals. It was beautiful, once.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D7CE])
[INFO:0200D7DA] ('We've made it to the courtyard.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D7CD])
[INFO:0200D7D8] ('Everything's been torn down... the whole place looks... well, dead. It's like we're the first to set foot here in centuries.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D7CC])

column2: DLC1VQ04RNPCCourtyardBranchTopic "What happened to the castle courtyard?" [DIAL:0200D7CB]
column4: [INFO:0200D7E7] ('If I had to guess, I'd say the moment mother fled the castle, father went on a rampage.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ04RNPCCourtyardBranchTopic "What happened to the castle courtyard?" [DIAL:0200D7CB])

column3: DLC1VQ04RNPCCourtyardBranchTopic "What happened to the castle courtyard?" [DIAL:0200D7CB]
column5: What happened to the castle courtyard?

column2: DLC1VQ04RNPCCourtyardBranchTopic01 "Then he just walled it off." [DIAL:0200D7CA]
column4: [INFO:0200D7E4] ('It appears that way. I suppose he wanted to put the past behind him.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ04RNPCCourtyardBranchTopic01 "Then he just walled it off." [DIAL:0200D7CA])

column3: DLC1VQ04RNPCCourtyardBranchTopic01 "Then he just walled it off." [DIAL:0200D7CA]
column5: Then he just walled it off.

column4: [INFO:0200D7E1] ('Very clever, mother. Very clever.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D7C9])
[INFO:0200D7DE] ('I've never been in those tunnels before, but I'd bet they run right under the courtyard and into the tower ruins.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D7C8])
[INFO:0200D7DC] ('Well, at least we're getting closer. Let's go.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D7C7])
[INFO:0200D675] ('Enough, Vyrthur. Give us the bow!' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D672])
[INFO:0200D67C] ('How dare you. I was the Arch-Curate of Auri-El, girl. I had the ears of a god!' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D66F])
[INFO:0200D67A] ('Until the "Betrayed" corrupted you. Yes, yes. We've heard this sad story.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D66E])
[INFO:0200D678] ('Gelebor and his kind are easily manipulated fools.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D66D])
[INFO:0200D677] ('You're... you're a vampire?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D66C])
[INFO:0200D676] ('The moment I was infected by one of my own Initiates, Auri-El turned his back on me.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D66B])
[INFO:0200D674] ('You want to take revenge... on a god?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D66A])
[INFO:0200D673] ('Auri-El himself may have been beyond my reach, but his influence on our world wasn't.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D669])
[INFO:0200D67D] ('The blood of a vampire... Auriel's Bow...' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D668])
[INFO:0200D67B] ('A prophecy that lacked a single, final ingredient... the blood of a pure vampire. The blood of a Daughter of Coldharbour.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D667])
[INFO:0200D679] ('You were waiting... all this time for someone with my blood to come along.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200D666])

column5: The ingredients are in the vessel.

column2: DLC1VQ04RNPCLabPortalBranchTopic01 "Can I ask you something first?" [DIAL:0200D3D6]
column4: [INFO:0200D3E5] ('Of course. What is it?' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ04RNPCLabPortalBranchTopic01 "Can I ask you something first?" [DIAL:0200D3D6])

column3: DLC1VQ04RNPCLabPortalBranchTopic01 "Can I ask you something first?" [DIAL:0200D3D6]
column5: Can I ask you something first?

column5: I'm ready.

column2: DLC1VQ04RNPCLabQuestionsBranchTopic "What will you do if we find your mother?" [DIAL:0200D3D4]
column4: [INFO:0200D3DF] ('I've been asking myself the same thing since we came back to the castle.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ04RNPCLabQuestionsBranchTopic "What will you do if we find your mother?" [DIAL:0200D3D4])

column3: DLC1VQ04RNPCLabQuestionsBranchTopic "What will you do if we find your mother?" [DIAL:0200D3D4]
column5: What will you do if we find your mother?

column2: DLC1VQ04RNPCLabQuestionsBranchTopic01a "It sounds like she did everything for your sake." [DIAL:0200D3D3]
column4: [INFO:0200D3DD] ('Possibly. I guess even a vampire mother is still a mother.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ04RNPCLabQuestionsBranchTopic01a "It sounds like she did everything for your sake." [DIAL:0200D3D3])

column3: DLC1VQ04RNPCLabQuestionsBranchTopic01a "It sounds like she did everything for your sake." [DIAL:0200D3D3]
column5: It sounds like she did everything for your sake.

column2: DLC1VQ04RNPCLabQuestionsBranchTopic01b "I don't know what she was thinking." [DIAL:0200D3D2]
column4: [INFO:0200D3DB] ('Neither do I.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ04RNPCLabQuestionsBranchTopic01b "I don't know what she was thinking." [DIAL:0200D3D2])

column3: DLC1VQ04RNPCLabQuestionsBranchTopic01b "I don't know what she was thinking." [DIAL:0200D3D2]
column5: I don't know what she was thinking.

column2: DLC1VQ04RNPCLabQuestionsBranchTopic01c "It sounds like she was pretty selfish." [DIAL:0200D3D1]
column4: [INFO:0200D3D9] ('She wasn't, always. But I think you're right.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ04RNPCLabQuestionsBranchTopic01c "It sounds like she was pretty selfish." [DIAL:0200D3D1])

column3: DLC1VQ04RNPCLabQuestionsBranchTopic01c "It sounds like she was pretty selfish." [DIAL:0200D3D1]
column5: It sounds like she was pretty selfish.

column2: DLC1VQ04RNPCLabQuestionsEndBranchTopic "We won't know until we find her." [DIAL:0200D3D0]
column4: [INFO:0200D3EB] ('Yes... yes, you're right. I'm sorry. I just didn't expect anyone to care how I felt about her. Thank you.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ04RNPCLabQuestionsEndBranchTopic "We won't know until we find her." [DIAL:0200D3D0])

column4: [INFO:0200A85B] ('This structure is known as a wayshrine. They were used for meditation and for transport when the Chantry was a place of enlightenment.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200A84D])
[INFO:0200A874] ('Prelates of these shrines were charged with teaching the mantras of Auri-El to our Initiates.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200A84C])

[INFO:0200A870] ('Once the Initiate completed his mantras, he'd dip a ceremonial ewer in the basin at the wayshrine's center and proceed to the next wayshrine.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200A84B])
[INFO:0200A86D] ('Well, once the Initiate's enlightenment was complete, he'd bring the ewer to the Chantry's Inner Sanctum.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200A84A])
[INFO:0200A869] ('I know how it all sounds, but if there was another way I'd have done it long ago.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200A849])

[INFO:0200886A] ('I think my father wanted to see you. Have you talked to him yet?' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ03VampireHellos [DIAL:020069A2])

[INFO:0201909C] ([R]'If you think I'll help you, you're mistaken.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ03VampireHellos [DIAL:020069A2])
[INFO:0201909E] ([R]'I'm not afraid of you!' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ03VampireHellos [DIAL:020069A2])

column4: [INFO:02005E28] ('It's really too bad, you know. The little accident you had here, completely unexpected...' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02005E22])
[INFO:02005E25] ('Yeah, too bad. Lord Harkon's new favorite, dead so soon after joining the family.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02005E21])
[INFO:02005E31] ('We're just lucky I was here to return the Chalice to Vingalmo, so he could make sure Harkon gets it back.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02005E20])
[INFO:02005E2F] ('Wait, what? That's not what we agreed. We take it back together.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02005E1F])
[INFO:02005E2B] ('Idiot. You didn't really think I'd let you walk out of here either, did you? Vingalmo wants you both dead.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02005E1C])
[INFO:02005E29] ('Well that's just fine. Orthjolf told me to finish off anyone who got in the way.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02005E1B])
[INFO:02005E27] ('Vingalmo and Orthjolf are Harkon's primary advisors. I'm sure they're quite surprised to learn that you're taking the Chalice.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02005E1A])

[INFO:02005DA1] ([G]'It's good to see you again.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQElderHellos [DIAL:02005D7C])
[INFO:02005DA0] ('I trust your journey was successful?' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQElderHellos [DIAL:02005D7C])
[INFO:02005946] ('And I suppose you're the one Tolan says is actually doing something about this mess.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1HunterBaseIntroIsranStage20InitBranchTopic [DIAL:0200593B])

column5: I have a message from Harkon.

column4: [INFO:02005942] ('Lord Harkon has never cared to use the Chalice, relying on his more than adequate powers until now.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02005939])
[INFO:02005940] ('Excuse us. I need to fetch the Bloodstone Chalice.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02005938])
[INFO:0200593E] ('The Chalice? Why?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02005937])
[INFO:0200593C] ('What're you up to, Garan?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02005936])
[INFO:02005949] ('Lord Harkon's orders, Orthjolf. Calm yourself.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02005935])
[INFO:02005948] ('Our friend here has been ordered to fill the Chalice.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02005934])
[INFO:02005947] ('Really?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02005933])
[INFO:02005945] ('Indeed. She's off to Redwater Den.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02005932])
[INFO:02005944] ('Indeed. He's off to Redwater Den.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02005932])
[INFO:02005941] ('Well, then...  Best of luck to you.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02005931])
[INFO:0200593F] ('And here we are.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02005930])

[INFO:0200593D] ([G]'Now, this Chalice needs to be filled directly from the bloodspring that is the source of Redwater Den. But that's not enough.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VampireBaseIntroGaranStage15PostSceneFGTopic [DIAL:0200592F])

column3: DLC1RV06StartTopic "What can I do to help?" [DIAL:020058BB]
column5: What can I do to help?

column2: DLC1RV06StartContinue1 "And that's any of your business because... ?" [DIAL:020058BA]

column3: DLC1RV06StartContinue1 "And that's any of your business because... ?" [DIAL:020058BA]
column5: And that's any of your business because... ?

column5: Yes. I am married.

column4: [INFO:020058C9] ('An unattended attachment, such as found in your beloved husband creates... an opportunity for unnecessary agitation.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1RV06StartContinue2 "..." [DIAL:020058B8])

[INFO:020058C8] ('An unattended attachment, such as found in your beloved wife creates... an opportunity for unnecessary agitation.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1RV06StartContinue2 "..." [DIAL:020058B8])

[INFO:020058C4] ('Why, you would be distraught with emotion, perhaps even to the point of questioning your loyalty to this Court. And we ours to you.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1RV06StartContinue3 "..." [DIAL:020058B7])
[INFO:020058C2] ('My sincerest pardons, I but look after your own peace of mind.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1RV06StartContinue4 "You try my patience, <Alias=QuestGiver>." [DIAL:020058B6])

column5: You try my patience, <Alias=QuestGiver>.

column4: [INFO:0200838E] ([R][RE]'The air, the ground... this is all wrong.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])

[INFO:0200838C] ([R]'You'd think a vampire would be right at home in this place. You'd be wrong. Let's just find my mother and get out of here, quickly.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])
[INFO:0200838B] ([R]'I feel terrible for the dead who end up here for eternity. Seems awful. Like they're still suffering.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])
[INFO:0200838D] ([R]'Look at the sky. What kind of a place is this?' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])
[INFO:02008389] ([R]'I'd heard stories about the Soul Cairn, but never thought I'd see it myself. So far it's... about what I imagined.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])
[INFO:0200838A] ([R]'Let's keep moving. I feel like we're being watched.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])
[INFO:02019908] ([R]'Look at this place. I can't imagine choosing to come here. My mother must have been terrified.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])
[INFO:02019907] ([R][RE]'I can't believe we found my mother alive... well, you know what I mean.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])
[INFO:02019906] ([R]'I'm glad you're here. I don't think I could be doing this alone.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])
[INFO:02019905] ([R]'The sooner we get out of this place, the better.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])
[INFO:02019904] ('Let's kill those... Keeper things and get back to the prison.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])
[INFO:02019903] ('The barrier should be gone now. Let's head back.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])
[INFO:02019902] ('Come on, she's leading us to the scroll.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])
[INFO:02019901] ([G][R][RE]'We have to keep my mother alive!' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])
[INFO:02019900] ([G][R]'Kill that beast!' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])
[INFO:020198FF] ([G][R][RE]'Come on, let's go home.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])
[INFO:020198FE] ([G][R]'I'm glad we found the scroll, but I... I wish she could come with us.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])
[INFO:02008388] ([G][R]'The sooner we get the scroll home, the sooner we deal with my father.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])
[INFO:02008405] ('If you want that scroll, the barrier needs to come down.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])
[INFO:02011597] ('You're doing well, but two of the spires remain intact.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])
[INFO:02011596] ('Only a single spire remains. Be careful, I'm almost certain the final Keeper will be prepared for your assault.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])
[INFO:02011595] ('The Elder Scroll is just a bit further.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])
[INFO:02008404] ([G][R][RE]'Focus on the dragon!' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])
[INFO:02008403] ([G][R]'Idiot! I can't get to the scroll with Durnehviir attacking us!' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])
[INFO:0200838F] ('What did you want?' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])
[INFO:02008401] ('Did you have anything to ask before you depart?' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05Hellos [DIAL:02005853])

column2: DLC1VQ05ValericaIntroBranchTopic "You wanted to speak with me?" [DIAL:02005852]
column4: [INFO:02005867] ('So how has it come to pass that a vampire hunter is in the company of my daughter?' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05ValericaIntroBranchTopic "You wanted to speak with me?" [DIAL:02005852])

column2: DLC1VQ05ValericaIntroBranchTopic "You wanted to speak with me?" [DIAL:02005852]
column4: [INFO:02005866] ('So how has it come to pass that a vampire of mixed blood is in the company of my daughter?' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05ValericaIntroBranchTopic "You wanted to speak with me?" [DIAL:02005852])

column3: DLC1VQ05ValericaIntroBranchTopic "You wanted to speak with me?" [DIAL:02005852]
column5: You wanted to speak with me?

column4: [INFO:020138C1] ('Is it really you? I can't believe it!' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02005851])
[INFO:0200585E] ('Is it really you? I can't believe it!' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02005851])
[INFO:0200585A] ('Serana? What are you doing here? Where's your father?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02005850])
[INFO:02005856] ('He doesn't know we're here. I don't have time to explain.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200584F])
[INFO:02005870] ('I must have failed. Harkon's found a way to decipher the prophecy, hasn't he.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200584E])
[INFO:02019202] ('No, you've got it all wrong. We're here to complete the prophecy our way, not his.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200584D])
[INFO:0200586C] ('No, you've got it all wrong. We're here to stop him... to make everything right.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200584D])
[INFO:02005865] ('Wait a moment... you've brought a stranger here? Have you lost your mind?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200584C])
[INFO:02005863] ('No, you don't...' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200584B])
[INFO:02005861] ('You. Come forward. I would speak with you.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:0200584A])
[INFO:0200585D] ('Mother!' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02005849])

[INFO:02014747] ('Coming from one who murders vampires as a trade, I find it hard to believe your intentions are noble.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05ValericaIntroBranchTopic01 "I've been keeping her safe." [DIAL:02005848])
column8: This is no ruse. I want to keep her safe.

column4: [INFO:02005859] ('Safe? You call bringing her here safe? Has she explained nothing to you?' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQ05ValericaIntroBranchTopic01 "I've been keeping her safe." [DIAL:02005848])

column5: I've been keeping her safe.

column4: [INFO:02010EBF] ([R]'Now that the Dawnguard are back, the vampires' reign of terror is about to end.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02010EBE] ([R]'Isran knows how to fight those monsters. He's been preparing for this day for a long time.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02010EBD] ([R]'I hope the vampires try to attack us here. A lot easier than hunting them down in their holes.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02010EBC] ([R]'I'm glad we're finally taking the fight to those monsters.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02010EBB] ([R]'I don't think the vampires would be stupid enough to attack us here, but you never know.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02010EBA] ([R]'Got to keep alert. We don't want to get caught napping like the Vigilants did.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02004218] ([R][RE]'Is something wrong?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02004217] ([R]'What is it?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:0200421E] ([R][RE]'Need something?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:0200421D] ([R]'What can I do for you?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:0200421C] ([R]'Arkay be with you, my friend.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:0200421A] ([R][RE]'Well met, friend.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02004219] ([R]'How can I help?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02013FDF] ([R][RE] in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02013FDD] ([R] in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02013FDC] ([R] in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02004E0B] ('It is my sworn duty to see Arkay's wrath delivered to all the undead. It's usually a good bit of fun, too.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02004E0A] ('Don't you worry about me. I've been through worse. I'll come out of this just fine.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02004E09] ('I once killed thirty vampires with my bare hands, you know. Ask Arkay, he'll tell you.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02004E08] ('Arkay's been watching over me for years now. He says he's not too sure about you yet, though.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02004E07] ('We'll stop these monsters. We have to
column5: we're the only ones who can.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])

column4: [INFO:02004E06] ('We can't give up. There's no one else to stand against these monsters.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02004E05] ('Our sense of what's right is what separates us from the vampires. Don't forget that.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02004E04] ('This is fine for now, but we can't stay holed up here forever.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02004E03] ('Cozy little place, isn't this?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02004E02] ('I think we have a better chance of surviving here, don't you?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02004E01] ('There are at least thirty different ways of being attacked and killed in your own home at any given moment.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02004E00] ('Very few people appreciate all the horrible things that can happen to you if you're not being cautious.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02004DFF] ('I like what Isran has done with the place. It's good to see someone else who's really prepared.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02004DFE] ('Hope you're getting along with Isran. He takes some getting used to.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02004DFD] ('If we're going to survive this, we're going to have to be as ruthless as our enemies.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02004DFC] ('The vampires will show us no mercy. They've proven that.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02004DFB] ('Even with all my preparations, we can't be too careful. The monsters could strike at us at any moment.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02004DFA] ('Be on your guard at all times. Avoid sleep if you can... Sleep is for the weak.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])
[INFO:02004DF9] ('I knew it would come to this one day. I knew, and no one believed.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DCA])

column2: DLC1HunterBaseDialogueIsranInitialBranchTopic "Any advice for a new vampire hunter?" [DIAL:02004DC9]
column4: [INFO:02004DF8] ('There's only one thing worth remembering.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1HunterBaseDialogueIsranInitialBranchTopic "Any advice for a new vampire hunter?" [DIAL:02004DC9])

column3: DLC1HunterBaseDialogueIsranInitialBranchTopic "Any advice for a new vampire hunter?" [DIAL:02004DC9]
column5: Any advice for a new vampire hunter?

column4: [INFO:02004DE5] ([SO]'Well, this isn't exactly a palace, is it? Still, it's sturdy, secure, and seems defensible.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1HunterBaseDialogueArielleInitialBranchTopic [DIAL:02004DC8])
[INFO:02004DDE] ([SO]'Here we are.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1HunterBaseDialogueGunmarInitialBranchTopic [DIAL:02004DC7])

[INFO:02004DDA] ([SO]'Arkay says it's good that we're here, but I don't know... Something about this place doesn't feel right.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1HunterBaseDialogueFlorentiusInitialBranchTopic [DIAL:02004DC6])
[INFO:02004DD3] ('Well, well. Where've you been, Vingalmo? Nose stuck in a book all day?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DC5])
[INFO:02004DD0] ('Orthjolf, I'm surprised!' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DC4])
[INFO:02004DCD] ('I didn't even think you knew what a book was, my brutish friend.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DC3])
[INFO:02004DF7] ('You'd do well to watch that tongue, elf.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DC2])
[INFO:02004DE4] ('And you'd do well to be more careful of whom you engage in witty banter.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DC1])
[INFO:02004DE1] ('Surprised you weren't at the last meeting with our Lord, Vingalmo. Too busy plotting to overthrow him to show up?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DC0])
[INFO:02004DDD] ('What? What meeting? I wasn't informed of any such thing!' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DBF])
[INFO:02004DD9] ('Oh, I see. I just assumed he'd sent for both of us. How awkward for you.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DBE])
[INFO:02004DD6] ('My dear Salonia, how are you?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DBD])
[INFO:02004DD2] ('I am well, sire.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DBC])
[INFO:02004DCF] ('And you haven't forgotten what you need to do, have you?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DBB])
[INFO:02004DCC] ('No, sire. I have not.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DBA])
[INFO:02004DF6] ('Wonderful. Carry on, then.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DB9])
[INFO:02004DE3] ('Do you... do you need anything, Feran?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DB8])
[INFO:02004DE0] ('What?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DB7])
[INFO:02004DDC] ('Can I assist you? You know I live to serve.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DB6])
[INFO:02004DD8] ('No, I don't need anything right now. Please stop asking.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DB5])
[INFO:02004DD5] ('Yes, of course.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DB4])
[INFO:02004DD1] ('Ronthil, where is the last batch of alchemy ingredients I asked you for?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DB3])
[INFO:02004DCE] ('Ah, yes. That. There were... well, complications.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DB2])
[INFO:02004DCB] ('I don't want to hear about it. I want what I asked for.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DB1])
[INFO:02004DF5] ('Yes, Feran. Of course. I'll see to it.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DB0])
[INFO:02004DE2] ('Vingalmo, is there... can I do anything for you?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAF])
[INFO:02004DDF] ('I don't recall addressing you, worm.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAE])
[INFO:02004DDB] ('No, I just... I thought perhaps...' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAD])
[INFO:02004DD7] ('In the unlikely event that I ever require you for some reason, I shall find you. Until then I see no reason for us to be speaking.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAC])
[INFO:02004DD4] ('Very good. I'll just... I'll be going now.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAB])
[INFO:02015C85] ([R]'Hello there.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02015C84] ([R]'Well met, sister.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02015C83] ([R]'My Lord.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:020128A8] ([R]'First Serana, now you find a Moth Priest. I'm sure Lord Harkon is very pleased with you... for now.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02011E4B] ([R][RE]'There's plenty for all.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02011E4A] ([R]'The feast never ends here in Castle Volkihar.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02011E49] ([R]'Sit down and enjoy yourself.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02011E48] ([R]'I'm a loyal servant of the lord of the castle, nothing more.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02011E47] ([R][RE]'Leave me in peace.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02011E46] ([R]'Find your own thrall. This one's mine.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02011E45] ([R]'I have everything I need right here.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02011E44] ([R]'I leave politics to others. I serve the lord of the castle.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02010D84] ([G]'Present yourself to Lord Harkon at once.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02010D85] ([G]'You would dare address me?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02003248] ('It is an honor to serve Harkon, is it not?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02003249] ('Let someone else rule. I just want to kill and feed.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:0200324A] ('Once saw Harkon rip a man in half. He's powerful like you wouldn't believe.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02019CA1] ([R]'Lord Harkon has searched for his daughter for so long. He must be very grateful.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02018B2B] ('If there's any way I can be of service, please let me know.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:0200324C] ([R]'Well met, brother.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:020139B1] ([G]'Mind yourself.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:020128A3] ([R]'Seems you're the court favorite. At least, for the moment.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:020128A4] ([R]'I'm sure Lord Harkon is grateful you've returned his daughter.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:020128A5] ([R]'All this talk of Elder Scrolls and Auriel's Bow... Lord Harkon's ambition truly is great.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:020128A6] ([R]'Can we really trust the words of this Moth Priest? What if he's just lying to save his worthless skin?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:020128A7] ([R]'Lord Harkon will finally have his wish... to see the prophecy fulfilled. Then we will all benefit.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02015C86] ([R]'Do you need something?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:0200324B] ([R]'My Lady.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02018B2E] ([R]'I find it tiring to converse with someone in that form. Too much effort.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02015C82] ('Living here, I have access to magic I couldn't possibly imagine before.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02015C81] ('Politics bore me terribly, but they're a fact of life here.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02018B2D] ('Life here has many advantages, don't you agree?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02015C80] ([G]'Look at you, wandering around causing trouble. Precious.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02018B2C] ([R]'I hope you're not trying to lord your abilities over me.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02015C7F] ('It is good to have powerful allies, is it not?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02015C7E] ('Feran is so good to me, allowing me to be his assistant.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02015C7D] ('I hope you find life in the castle to be to your liking.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02015C7C] ([G]'No, no. You must speak with Lord Harkon, not me!' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02018B2A] ([R]'Mind yourself in that form. Don't go damaging my thralls.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02015C7B] ('I try and meet the needs of everyone here. No reason for any of us to go hungry.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02018B29] ('You're welcome here, as long as you don't overfeed on the thralls.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02015C7A] ([G]'Don't speak to me, meat.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02018B28] ([R]'It's difficult to have a conversation with you like that. Would you mind changing back?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02004DF4] ('Never made it far in the Companions, but now... I'd like to see any of them try and call me "whelp" again.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02018B27] ('If you need anything, say the word. I can still forge a decent blade.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02004DF3] ('No one will soon forget that you were the one to defeat Harkon.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02004DF2] ([G]'You disrespect our Lord by speaking to me instead of him.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02018B26] ([R]'Yes, yes. Aren't you lovely looking like that. Do you mind?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02004DF1] ('I have never understood the Nord fascination with weapons. Magic is so much more versatile, don't you think?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02004DF0] ('I saw more than enough political maneuvering in my time in House Dres. I was tired of it then, and I'm tired of it now.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02018B1D] ('I am at your service, as always.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02004DE6] ([R]'You realize it's not really necessary to take on that form here.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02018B25] ('I am above the petty squabbles here. I have lived for far too long to be bothered with them.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02004DEF] ([G]'Present yourself to Lord Harkon at once.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02018B24] ([R]'Parading around in that form won't do you any good here.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02004DEE] ('Why worry about who has the bigger chair at the table when there's more than enough to go around?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02004DED] ('I wish Orthjolf and Vingalmo would just get it over with and kill each other. I'm tired of listening to them.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02018B23] ('None can deny your power now.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02004DEC] ([G]'I don't converse with my meals.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02018B22] ([R]'You've gone from a between-meal snack to the darling of the court. Impressive.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02018B21] ([R]'So you found the Moth Priest. Let's see you find the rest of the Elder Scrolls all on your own.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02004DEB] ('We need strength, power. Not magic. Elves don't seem to understand that.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02004DEA] ('You can't trust a word that comes out of Vingalmo's mouth. Remember that.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02018B20] ('Don't get in my way, and I won't tear your arms off. Simple, isn't it?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02004DE9] ([R]'You realize that doesn't impress anyone here.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02018B1F] ([R]'Here we are, in view of seeing the prophecy fulfilled. These are truly great times.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02018B1E] ([R]'I hope you find Lord Harkon's court to your liking.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02004DE8] ('Remember your place, and you'll be taken care of.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02004DE7] ('Life here is better than you could find anywhere in Skyrim.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:020139B3] ([G]'Bother someone else.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004DAA])
[INFO:02004D09] ('(Sigh)...' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02004CF6])
DLC1LD_KatriaAlreadyHaveShards [INFO:02014F08] ('Really? Well, now, that make things easier...' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1LD_SharedInfos [DIAL:02004CF1])
DLC1LD_D2_TonalLockIntro [INFO:02005735] ('You know what this is? It's a lock. A 'Tonal Lock'. Simple, and very, very deadly.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1LD_SharedInfos [DIAL:02004CF1])

column4: [INFO:02003FBF] ('And it seems we have a problem.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003FB6])
[INFO:02003FBC] ('Since you could've attacked me before now, I'm going to assume this was a little accident on your part.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003FB5])
[INFO:02003FB9] ('And so I'm going to give you a chance to get yourself cured.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003FB4])
[INFO:02003FCC] ('Go to Morthal and find Falion. He's the only one I know of in Skyrim that can cure vampirism.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003FB3])
[INFO:02003FC8] ('If you can manage that, the Dawnguard still may have use for you.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003FB2])
[INFO:02003FC6] ('I'll be waiting.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003FB0])
[INFO:02003FC9] ('Welcome back.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003FAF])

[INFO:02003FC1] ('Sorine and Gunmar are settling in.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003FAD])

column4: [INFO:02003FB8] ('How are your friends?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003FAA])
[INFO:02003FCB] ('Which friends would those be?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003FA9])
[INFO:02003FC7] ('Why the trolls, of course! You seem to have quite a way with them.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003FA8])
[INFO:02003FC5] ('What?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003FA7])
[INFO:02003FC3] ('I don't know how you do it, getting them into that pen and putting armor on them. A very special relationship, clearly.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003FA6])
[INFO:02003FC2] ('Very funny.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003FA5])
[INFO:02003FC0] ('I'd like to be able to make a potion without tasting iron flakes, you know?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003FA4])
[INFO:02003FBD] ('I can't help that space is cramped in here, Florentius.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003FA3])
[INFO:02003FBA] ('I'd also like to not have to smell troll all the time.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003FA2])
[INFO:02003FB7] ('They're trolls. They smell like trolls. I can't help that either.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003FA1])
[INFO:02003FCA] ('Yes, they smell like trolls. But do you have to? Consider washing up a bit more often.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003FA0])
[INFO:02003F46] ('Are you alright? Come on, we can do this. I know we can.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003F45])
[INFO:02003F41] ('Wait, stop! I yield!' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003F3E])
[INFO:02003F40] ('That... that wasn't me you were fighting.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003F3D])
[INFO:02003F3F] ('Thank you for breaking that foul vampire's hold over me.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003F3C])
[INFO:02003D9C] (in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003D9A])
[INFO:02003DA1] (in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003D99])
[INFO:02003DA0] (in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003D98])
[INFO:02003D94] ('Farewell, and good journey milady.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQElderGoodbyes [DIAL:02003D92])
[INFO:02003D93] ('Farewell, and good journey milord.' in GRUP Topic Children of DLC1VQElderGoodbyes [DIAL:02003D92])
[INFO:02003D71] ('Those vampires put up a hell of a fight.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003D70])
[INFO:02003D76] ('I just hope we weren't too late.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003D6F])
[INFO:02003D75] ('You think they turned him?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003D6E])
[INFO:02003D74] ('I don't know, maybe. Won't know until we get him out of there.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003D6D])
[INFO:02003D73] ('How do we do that?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003D6C])
[INFO:02003D72] ('I'm working on it, now give me some silence so I can think.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003D6A])
[INFO:02003D14] ('The more you fight me, the more you will suffer, mortal.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003D0E])
[INFO:02003D13] ('I will resist you, monster. I must!' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003D0D])
[INFO:02003D12] ('How much longer can you keep this up, Moth Priest?' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003D0C])
[INFO:02003D11] ('Must... resist...' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003D0B])
[INFO:02003D10] ('Yes, I can feel your defenses crumbling. You want it to end. You want to give in to me.' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003D0A])
[INFO:02003D0F] ('Yes master' in GRUP Topic Children of [DIAL:02003D09])
